snippet: Federal election regulators want former Senator Larry Craig to pay $140,000 in fines and return nearly $217,000 to his campaign, arguing that he misused the money to fund his legal defense after his 2007 arrest in an airport bathroom sex sting.
abstract: Federal election regulators want former Idaho Sen Larry Craig to pay $140,000 in fines and return nearly $217,000 to his campaign, arguing that he misused the money to fund his legal defense after his 2007 arrest in an airport bathroom sex sting.
lead_paragraph: Federal election regulators want former Senator Larry Craig to pay $140,000 in fines and return nearly $217,000 to his campaign, arguing that he misused the money to fund his legal defense after his 2007 arrest in an airport bathroom sex sting.
